replies.body:
Hey there FilAmOzNoob, 

I cannot guarantee this due to not being heavily involved or interested in the LCS but I would assume the Season 5 LCS will commenced at the same time Season 5 itself commences which I guess will be sometime around mid January. Based off last season (Season 4) starting on the 14th of January this year. Preseason competitions though in each region have already commenced. 

All aboard the Unicorns of Love bandwagon. 

Regards,
lols =)
